```{r setup}
#| include: false
library("targets")
library("tidyverse")
tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- tar_read(lipidomics)
```

### Basic stats table

```{r}
#| echo: false
tar_read(table_descriptive_stats) |>
  knitr::kable(caption = "The mean and standard deviation of metabolites in the lipidomics dataset.")
```

### Plot of distributions

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Metabolite distributions"
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
tar_read(plot_distributions)
```

## Statistical modelling

### Preparing the data

```{r}
lipidomics |>
  count(code, metabolite) |>
  filter(n > 1)
```
